name: Queenchantment
description:
A long time ago, a queen had committed awful atrocities to become the most beautiful person in her kingdom. But her greed eventually had become the end of her. Nearby kingdoms had realized her actions and had called upon the most powerful mages in the world. And those mages had cursed her to suffer eternally in her castle. She had stayed in her castle a long time while she was admiring the outside kingdoms, princesses, and queens. But she had been reaching her limit... Thus she called upon her best generals to help her to get revenge on those people who inflicted this curse upon her!





Ready your troops and build your traps to hold the incoming kingdom soldiers and their allies in a 2D tower defense game!

Unique Features


* Active Gameplay to Keep You In the Game
* In-between Cinematics to Explain the story
* 18 Unique Traps
* Many stages With 3 Different Tilesets
* Environmental Hazards On Maps.
* Destroyable traps to make you strategize better
* A Perk tree to progress your traps.
* Side-Scrolling camera angle for a different way of playing tower defense.
* Combo System for traps to act differently with each other.
* Uniquely made Allies for different gameplay.



Gameplay

As the general of the Lich Queen, you must stop the Royal King's forces with whatever you have at your disposal while The Queen is trying to finish her ritual. Build traps to get assistance from Lich Queen's servants and use your powers to stop the king's army. If you lose a trap, fret not! With scraps you get from traps that you destroyed, you can build better and stronger traps. Use the enemy souls for progress in your perk tree and become a better general to try new strategies! Strategize, be active and keep your eyes on the battlefield to make sure to win enough time for your Queen!
